price: 6. Mpe tokotunaka ya sólo baye totindelaki bango batindami, mpe ya sólo, tokotunaka batindami.
arabic: فَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: falanasalanna alladhīna ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna al-mur'salīna
